AI Description: The AWS Command Line Interface (CLI) is a unified tool that provides a consistent interface for interacting with various Amazon Web Services (AWS) through the command line. It allows users to manage AWS services and resources directly from the terminal.
Core Features: Interact With Various Aws Services, Control Multiple Aws Resources, Automate Aws Tasks, Access & Manage Aws Cli Configuration
General Tags: Cloud Computing, Command Line Interface, Aws Services
